channel.title: I Did Ketamine
channel.description:
well, In a way.
Long story short - broke my left arm for the second time this year skateboarding. Needed immediate surgery. I've got two 4 inch stainless steel plates in my arm with 8 pins each (I think, possibly 6).
They gave me ketamine to do the operation. It was fucked up. Before they put it in my IV, my surgeon told me to think of my favorite dream. I thought of flying, and the last fucking thing I remember was them putting that oxygen thing in my nose. I started coming down, I don't even fucking know how long I was on that shit. It was around 12 am, and I remember tripping fucking balls. I don't know if I was awake during the operation or not. I came off, and my arm felt like it weighed 80 tons. By the way, I was completely out of my fucking body. I looked at my surgeon and said sorry about 12 times. why? I couldn't fucking tell you. I started trying to talk to my dad but I still felt out of my body. I didn't get to sleep until 3 AM, and all night I asked myself "Is this my life?". Felt fine the next day, ate, got let out at 8 pm.
It was fucked up dude
Edit: First break in June of this year [img]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/1452/armo.jpg[/img]

item.title: I Did Ketamine
item.dc:creator: @Andrew Andrew
item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:10, topic:370994”]Its not unusual at all, it’s very common for emergency surgery and leg breaks and shit, in fact its considered one of the drugs required in a minimal heath system.

Ketamine: Not just for horses ;)[/quote]

I found it fun. Anything to not feel them cutting open my arm and putting metal plates on my bones, lol

Read full topic

Its not unusual at all, it’s very common for emergency surgery and leg breaks and shit, in fact its considered one of the drugs required in a minimal heath system.

item.title: I Did Ketamine
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

You take shit for granted usually, then ket comes along and fucks your whole daily routine and makes you forget how to open a bottle of coke.

Tru’ story.

next up - ket hole.

Read full topic

item.title: I Did Ketamine
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I enjoyed the 2 or 3 times I did Ket, although I never entirely got completely shit faced on it, but enough to have to weird and enjoyable experiences.

Read full topic

item.title: I Did Ketamine
item.dc:creator: @Andrew Andrew
item.description:
@Andrew wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:5, topic:370994”]anesthesia is awesome in general, you’ll wake up and be talking and everything and then 10 mins later not remember a thing, as if you just woke up. its funny cause once i was awake i saw the guy beside me being woken up with the doctor talking to the guy and everything and then i asked the nurse if they did that to me as well, and apparently they did but i didnt remember a thing. also it feels like the best sleep ever

on another note ive never heard of ketamine being used for surgery[/quote]

Yeah I was reading and apparently it’s extremely uncommon… I seriously fucked up the first time I broke it, and they did surgery asap. I don’t have a pic of the second break, but I’ll post the first, it’s fucked.

Read full topic

item.title: I Did Ketamine
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I’ve heard of it being used more so on a vet base.

Than again, is party monster a reliable source?

Read full topic

item.title: I Did Ketamine
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

anesthesia is awesome in general, you’ll wake up and be talking and everything and then 10 mins later not remember a thing, as if you just woke up. its funny cause once i was awake i saw the guy beside me being woken up with the doctor talking to the guy and everything and then i asked the nurse if they did that to me as well, and apparently they did but i didnt remember a thing. also it feels like the best sleep ever

on another note ive never heard of ketamine being used for surgery

Read full topic

item.title: I Did Ketamine
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:3, topic:370994"]I have a hatred for ketamine, one of those drugs i just don’t enjoy or like the effects, ecstasy is much better.[/quote]Couldn’t really compare the two lol
